name: Calculate Amount In Material request
script: frappe.ui.form.on("Material Request",{	after_save: function(frm)	{	    		$.each(frm.doc.items || [], function (i, d)        {		            var a = d.qty;            var b = d.rate;    		var c = a * b;    		var h = d.amount;    		if(b == h )    		    		{    		    d.amount = c;    		}        });    {        var grand_total = 0;        $.each(frm.doc.items, function(i, d) {                grand_total += d.amount;        });        frm.set_value("total_amount",grand_total);        frm.refresh_field("total_amount");    }        }});

name: Manual Weight Entry
script: // frappe.ui.form.on('Quotation Item', {// 	qty:function(frm) {// 	    var a = cur_frm.doc.customer_type;// 	   // console.log(a);// 	   // alert(a);// 	    if(a == "Special"){// 	        alert("hey you are special customer")// 	        $.each(frm.doc.items || {}, function (i, d){// 		      var item = d.item_code;// 		      frappe.call({// 		          method:"weight",// 		          args:{"item":item},// 		      }).then(records => {//                         // alert(records["message"]);//                         var weight = records['msg']//                         d.weight_per_unit = weight;//                         // console.log(d.pcs)//                         // d.qty=d.pcs;// 		      });// 		  })// 	    }// 	}// })frappe.ui.form.on("Quotation Item", "pcs",function(frm, cdt, cdn){    var d = locals[cdt][cdn];    if (d.item_type=="Pipe 202" || d.item_type=="Pipe 202" || d.item_type=="Pipe 304" || d.item_type=="Pipe 316" || d.item_type=="Sheet 202" || d.item_type=="Sheet 304"){        var cust_type = cur_frm.doc.customer_type;        if (cust_type=="Special"){            // alert("hey you are special customer")            var item = d.item_code;            frappe.call({    		          method:"weight",    		          args:{"item":item},    		      }).then(records => {                            // alert(records["message"]);                        var weight = records['msg']                        d.weight_per_unit = weight;                        // console.log(d.pcs)                        var pcs=d.pcs;                        console.log("this is qty send")                        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "qty", pcs);                        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "weight_per_unit", weight);     		      });                }        else if (cust_type=="General"){            var pcs1=d.pcs;            frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "qty", pcs1);               }    }    else{        var pcs2=d.pcs;        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "qty", pcs2);      }    // alert("This is special size block");                        // var cust_type = cur_frm.doc.customer_type;    // if (cust_type=="Special"){    //     // alert("hey you are special customer")    //     var item = d.item_code;    //     frappe.call({		  //        method:"weight",		  //        args:{"item":item},		  //    }).then(records => {    //                     // alert(records["message"]);    //                 var weight = records['msg']    //                 d.weight_per_unit = weight;    //                 // console.log(d.pcs)    //                 var pcs=d.pcs;    //                 console.log("this is qty send")    //                 frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "qty", pcs);    //                 frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "weight_per_unit", weight); 		  //    });            // }    // else if (cust_type=="General"){    //     var pcs1=d.pcs;    //     frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "qty", pcs1);           // }                        // else if(cust_type=="General"){            // }    // var default_set = d.default_set    // var total_set = qty_box * default_set;    // var total_set = qty_box    // var total_inches = total_set * d.special_size;    // alert(total_inches);    // alert(total_set);    // frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "total_set", total_set);    // frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "qty", total_set);    // frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "total_inches",total_inches);    // if (d.price_list_rate !== ""){    //     // alert("hey")    //     var rate=d.price_amt*d.special_size;    //     frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "price_list_rate", rate);    // }});

script: frappe.listview_settings['Attendance'] = {       add_fields: ["status", "attendance_date"],	get_indicator: function (doc) {		if (["Present", "Work From Home"].includes(doc.status)) {			return [__(doc.status), "green", "status,=," + doc.status];		} else if (["Absent", "On Leave"].includes(doc.status)) {			return [__(doc.status), "red", "status,=," + doc.status];		} else if (doc.status == "Half Day") {			return [__(doc.status), "orange", "status,=," + doc.status];		}	},      onload: function (list_view) {		let me = this;		list_view.page.add_inner_button(__("Mark Attendance"), function () {			let first_day_of_month = moment().startOf('month');			if (moment().toDate().getDate() === 1) {				first_day_of_month = first_day_of_month.subtract(1, "month");			}			let dialog = new frappe.ui.Dialog({				title: __("Mark Attendance"),				fields: [					{						fieldname: "employee",						label: __("For Employee"),						fieldtype: "Link",						options: "Employee",						get_query: () => {							return {								query: "erpnext.controllers.queries.employee_query",							};						},						reqd: 1,						onchange: () => me.reset_dialog(dialog),					},					{						fieldtype: "Section Break",						fieldname: "time_period_section",						hidden: 1,					},					{						label: __("Start"),						fieldtype: "Date",						fieldname: "from_date",						reqd: 1,						default: first_day_of_month.toDate(),						onchange: () => me.get_unmarked_days(dialog),					},					{						fieldtype: "Column Break",						fieldname: "time_period_column",					},					{						label: __("End"),						fieldtype: "Date",						fieldname: "to_date",						reqd: 1,						default: moment().subtract(1, 'days').toDate(),						onchange: () => me.get_unmarked_days(dialog),					},					{						fieldtype: "Section Break",						fieldname: "days_section",						hidden: 1,					},					{						label: __("Status"),						fieldtype: "Select",						fieldname: "status",						options: ["Present", "Absent", "Half Day", "Work From Home"],						reqd: 1,					},					{						label: __("Exclude Holidays"),						fieldtype: "Check",						fieldname: "exclude_holidays",						onchange: () => me.get_unmarked_days(dialog),					},					{						label: __("Unmarked Attendance for days"),						fieldname: "unmarked_days",						fieldtype: "MultiCheck",						options: [],						columns: 2,					},				],				primary_action(data) {					if (cur_dialog.no_unmarked_days_left) {						frappe.msgprint(							__(								"Attendance from {0} to {1} has already been marked for the Employee {2}",								[data.from_date, data.to_date, data.employee]							)						);					} else {						frappe.confirm(							__("Mark attendance as {0} for {1} on selected dates?", [								data.status,								data.employee,							]),							() => {								frappe.call({									method: "hrms.hr.doctype.attendance.attendance.mark_bulk_attendance",									args: {										data: data,									},									callback: function (r) {										if (r.message === 1) {											frappe.show_alert({												message: __("Attendance Marked"),												indicator: "blue",											});											cur_dialog.hide();										}									},								});							}						);					}					dialog.hide();					list_view.refresh();				},				primary_action_label: __("Mark Attendance"),			});			dialog.show();		});	},	reset_dialog: function (dialog) {		let fields = dialog.fields_dict;		dialog.set_df_property(			"time_period_section",			"hidden",			fields.employee.value ? 0 : 1		);		dialog.set_df_property("days_section", "hidden", 1);		dialog.set_df_property("unmarked_days", "options", []);		dialog.no_unmarked_days_left = false;		fields.exclude_holidays.value = false;		fields.to_date.datepicker.update({            maxDate: moment().subtract(1, 'days').toDate()        });		this.get_unmarked_days(dialog)	},	get_unmarked_days: function (dialog) {		let fields = dialog.fields_dict;		if (fields.employee.value && fields.from_date.value && fields.to_date.value) {			dialog.set_df_property("days_section", "hidden", 0);			dialog.set_df_property("status", "hidden", 0);			dialog.set_df_property("exclude_holidays", "hidden", 0);			dialog.no_unmarked_days_left = false;			frappe				.call({					method: "hrms.hr.doctype.attendance.attendance.get_unmarked_days",					async: false,					args: {						employee: fields.employee.value,						from_date: fields.from_date.value,						to_date: fields.to_date.value,						exclude_holidays: fields.exclude_holidays.value,					},				})				.then((r) => {					var options = [];					for (var d in r.message) {						var momentObj = moment(r.message[d], "YYYY-MM-DD");						var date = momentObj.format("DD-MM-YYYY");						options.push({							label: date,							value: r.message[d],							checked: 1,						});					}					dialog.set_df_property(						"unmarked_days",						"options",						options.length > 0 ? options : []					);					dialog.no_unmarked_days_left = options.length === 0;				});		}	}, refresh: function(listview) {                  frappe.db.get_list('Attendance',{            fields:['in_time','out_time','name','shift','shift_hours']        }).then(result=>{               for (var e in result ){            var intime=result[e].in_time;            var outtime=result[e].out_time;            var Name=result[e].name;            var shiftName=result[e].shift;            var Shift_Hours=result[e].shift_hours;                        if(intime !== null && outtime !== null)            {                var splitIn = intime.split(' ')[1];                var splitOut = outtime.split(' ')[1];                                // frappe.db.set_value('Attendance',Name,'check_in_time',splitIn);                                var timeStart = new Date("01/01/2007 " + splitIn);                var timeEnd = new Date("01/01/2007 " + splitOut);                var diff_of_work_hours = timeEnd - timeStart;                              var work_hours_result = new Date(diff_of_work_hours);                    var Work_Hours =                ("0" + work_hours_result.getUTCHours()).slice(-2) + ":" +                ("0" + work_hours_result.getUTCMinutes()).slice(-2) + ":" +                ("0" + work_hours_result.getUTCSeconds()).slice(-2);                                if(Work_Hours > Shift_Hours)                {                    var WorkHours = new Date("01/01/2007 " + Work_Hours);                    var ShiftHours = new Date("01/01/2007 " + Shift_Hours);                    var diff_of_overtime = WorkHours - ShiftHours;                                  var overtime_result = new Date(diff_of_overtime);                        var OverTime =                    ("0" + overtime_result.getUTCHours()).slice(-2) + "." +                    ("0" + overtime_result.getUTCMinutes()).slice(-2);		                        frappe.db.set_value('Attendance',Name,'overtime',OverTime);                }                else                {                     frappe.db.set_value('Attendance',Name,'overtime','00.00');                }                          }                                             }                                     });                 }       // ,    // after_submit: function(frm){    //      frappe.db.get_list('Attendance',{    //         fields:['in_time','out_time','name']    //     }).then(result=>{           //     for (var e in result ){    //         var intime=result[e].in_time;    //         var outtime=result[e].out_time;    //         var Name=result[e].name;    //         if(intime !== null && outtime !== null)    //         {    //             var splitIn = intime.split(' ')[1];    //             var splitOut = outtime.split(' ')[1];                    //             frappe.db.set_value('Attendance',Name,'check_in_time',splitIn);    //             frappe.db.set_value('Attendance',Name,'check_out_time',splitOut);    //         }    //     }    //     });            // }     };

name: Calculate Shifthours
Clear Tax Table in Purchase invoice
Clear tax table in sales invoice
Rate1 and w_diff for unit-2
script: frappe.ui.form.on("Quotation Item", "weight",function(frm, cdt, cdn){    var d = locals[cdt][cdn];    var select_item_type = cur_frm.doc.select_item_type;    var margin = 0;    var rate202 = cur_frm.doc.rate202;    var rate304 = cur_frm.doc.rate304;    var rate316 = cur_frm.doc.rate316;    var sheet202 = cur_frm.doc.sheet202;    var sheet304 = cur_frm.doc.sheet304;    var cust_type = cur_frm.doc.customer_type;    var item_type = d.item_type;    var rate = 0;        if (cust_type=="Special"){        margin = d.special_margin;    }    else{        margin = d.normal_margin;    }    if (select_item_type=="Guage and Sheet"){        var we = d.weight;        var pcs = d.pcs;        var total_weight = d.weight_per_unit * pcs;        var we_diff=total_weight-we;                        if(item_type=="Pipe 202"){            rate = rate202 + margin;        }        else if(item_type=="Pipe 304"){            rate = rate304 + margin;        }        else if(item_type=="Pipe 316"){            rate = rate316 + margin;        }        else if(item_type=="Sheet 202"){            rate = sheet202 + margin;        }        else if(item_type=="Sheet 304"){            rate = sheet304 + margin;        }                var amt2 = rate * we;        var rate21 = we_diff / pcs;        var rate22 = d.weight_per_unit - rate21;        var rate23 = rate22 * rate;        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "weight_diff", we_diff);        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "rate1", rate);        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "price_list_rate", rate23);            }    else if(select_item_type=="Blustor And Pillar"){                if(item_type=="550 Grm R Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm55202;        }        else if(item_type=="650 Grm R Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm65202;        }        else if(item_type=="700 Grm R Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm70202;        }        else if(item_type=="900 Grm R Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm90202;        }        else if(item_type=="1100 Grm R Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm110202;        }        else if(item_type=="700 Grm Sq Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm70202;        }        else if(item_type=="800 Grm Sq Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm65202;        }        else if(item_type=="900 Grm Sq Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm90202;        }        else if(item_type=="1100 Grm Sq Blustor 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm110202;        }        else if(item_type=="550 Grm R Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm55304;        }        else if(item_type=="650 Grm R Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm65304;        }        else if(item_type=="700 Grm R Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm70304;        }        else if(item_type=="900 Grm R Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm90304;        }        else if(item_type=="1100 Grm R Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.rbgm110304;        }        else if(item_type=="700 Grm Sq Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm70304;        }        else if(item_type=="800 Grm Sq Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm65304;        }        else if(item_type=="900 Grm Sq Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm90304;        }        else if(item_type=="1100 Grm Sq Blustor 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.sqbgm110304;        }        else if(item_type=="1.1 Master Pillar 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar11202;        }        else if(item_type=="1.3 Master Pillar 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar13202;        }        else if(item_type=="1.5 Master Pillar 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar15202;        }        else if(item_type=="1.7 Master Pillar 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar17202;        }        else if(item_type=="2.2 Master Pillar 202"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar22202;        }        else if(item_type=="1.1 Master Pillar 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar11304;        }        else if(item_type=="1.3 Master Pillar 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar13304;        }        else if(item_type=="1.5 Master Pillar 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar15304;        }        else if(item_type=="1.7 Master Pillar 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar17304;        }        else if(item_type=="2.2 Master Pillar 304"){            rate = cur_frm.doc.mpillar22304;        }        var total_weight1 = d.weight_per_unit * d.pcs;        var we_diff1 = total_weight1 - d.weight;        var rate233 = rate;        // console.log("This is total weight", total_weight1);        // console.log("This is weight difference", we_diff1);        // console.log("This is rate", rate);        // console.log("This is rate233", rate233);        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "weight_diff", we_diff1);        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "rate1", rate);        frappe.model.set_value(cdt, cdn, "price_list_rate", rate233);    }});

script: frappe.ui.form.on('Payroll Entry', {    payroll_frequency(frm){        var payroll_frequency = frm.doc.payroll_frequency;		var name = frm.doc.name;		frm.set_value('payment_frequency', payroll_frequency);    },    after_save(frm){        	var name = frm.doc.name;            frappe.db.get_list('Payroll Entry',{                    fields:['payment_frequency'],                    filters:{                                name:name                    }                }).then(result=>{                                   for (var e in result )                        {                            var r=result[e].payment_frequency;                        }                        if(r !== '')                        {                            frm.add_custom_button("Get Employees Based On Payroll Frequency", function (click){                                        var row;                                        frappe.db.get_list('Employee',{                                            fields:['employee','employee_name','department','designation'],                                            filters:{                                                                                payment_frequency:r                                            }                                        }).then(res=>{                                                                            for (var e in res ){                                                var emp=res[e].employee;                                                var emp_nm=res[e].employee_name;                                                var depart=res[e].department;                                                var design=res[e].designation;                                                                                                                                                                                                console.log(emp, emp_nm, depart, design);                                                                                                row = frm.add_child("employees");                                                row.employee = emp;                                                row.employee_name = emp_nm;                                                row.department = depart;                                                row.designation = design;                                                frm.refresh_field("employees");                                                                                }                                                                                frm.save();                                        });                                                                                         });                                                      }                                   });                      }	});

name: Total Discount Amount
